title: voxday.net
author: VD
content_html:
Digital Cowboy has been kind enough to set up a website hosting, among other things, the Canon of Answers Vox Explained, at voxday.net. The site is open for perusal, but not for business as I have yet to order the books from the publisher. There is still some work to be done, (the CAVE isn’t numbered, I haven’t written a bio, etc), but DC has done yeoman’s work in constructing a complete and searchable column archive, and the two MP3s from the Northern Alliance Radio Show can be found there as well.

Finally, the much-requested Powerpoint slides for alphabet and phonics instruction are also available for download. So, check it out if you are so inclined.
content_text:
Digital Cowboy has been kind enough to set up a website hosting, among other things, the Canon of Answers Vox Explained, at
voxday.net
.  The site is open for perusal, but not for business as I have yet to order the books from the publisher.  There is still some work to be done, (the CAVE isn’t numbered, I haven’t written a bio, etc), but DC has done yeoman’s work in constructing a complete and searchable column archive, and the two MP3s from the Northern Alliance Radio Show can be found there as well.
Finally, the much-requested Powerpoint slides for alphabet and phonics instruction are also available for download. So, check it out if you are so inclined.
